thread.title: LSU’S Neal and Alexander pickup SEC weekly honors
thread.title_full: LSU’S Neal and Alexander pickup SEC weekly honors

author: McNeese State Sports Information Department
title: LSU’S Neal and Alexander pickup SEC weekly honors
text:
LSU’S Neal and Alexander pickup SEC weekly honors Posted: LAKE CHARLES, LA (KPLC) - 
LSU’S NEAL AND ALEXANDER PICKUP SEC WEEKLY HONORS 
BATON ROUGE – Defensive end Lewis Neal and offensive tackle Vadal Alexander were both honored by the Southeastern Conference on Monday for their performance in LSU’s 35-28 win over eighth-ranked Florida over the weekend. 
Neal, a junior from Wilson, N.C., was named the SEC Defensive Player of the Week after recording a career-high 10 tackles, 3.5 tackles for loss and 3.0 sacks against Florida. The 3.0 sacks rank as the second-highest total in a game in school history, while the 3.5 tackles for loss were the most by Tiger since Sam Montgomery’s 3.5 against Auburn in 2012. 
Neal led an LSU defensive effort that limited Florida to its lowest rushing output of the season with only 55 yards and just 1.8 yards a carry. 
Neal ranks second in the league in sacks with 7.0 and seventh in tackles for a loss with 7.5. 
Alexander, a senior from Buford, Ga., graded out at 90 percent and posted 13 knockdowns while not allowing any sacks or pressures against Florida. 
Alexander helped pave the way for another 100-yard rushing effort for Leonard Fournette, who racked up 180 yards and a pair of touchdowns on 31 carries. LSU rushed for 221 yards against a Florida defense that entered the game allowing just 99 yards a contest. 
Alexander the rest of the LSU offensive line held the Gators without a sack for the first time in 2015. Florida entered the contest leading the SEC with 21 sacks in its previous six games. 
2015 LSU Football Honors 
Mississippi State Leonard Fournette SEC Offensive Player of the Week 
Mississippi State Ethan Pocic SEC Offensive Lineman of the Week 
Auburn Leonard Fournette Walter Camp National Offensive Player of Week FWAA National Offensive Player of the Week 
Maxwell Award Player of the Week 
SEC Co-Offensive Player of the Week 
Auburn Vadal Alexander SEC Offensive Lineman of the Week 
Syracuse Leonard Fournette SEC Offensive Player of the Week 
South Carolina Ethan Pocic SEC Offensive Lineman of the Week 
South Carolina Derrius Guice SEC Freshman of the Week 
Florida Vadal Alexander SEC Offensive Lineman of the Week 
Florida Lewis Neal SEC Defensive Player of the Week Can't Find Something?
